home.title: Welcome to the Open Health Manager™!
home.subtitle: The Open Health Manager™ is the reference implementation for the MITRE Health Manager Lab under the Living Health Lab initiative. This project aims to radically flip the locus of health data from organizations to individuals, promoting individual agency in personal health through primary self-care and engagement with their care team.
